Package default_package

Class MyHeap<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>

java.lang.Object
default_package.MyHeap<E>
Type Parameters:
E - The type of the heap must be comparable.
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<E>
public class MyHeap<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<E>
Max-heap structure to store the values in the descending order.
Author:
Fatih
